properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_RESERVATION ( RESER_NO, RESER_DATE, RESER_NAME, RESER_PHONE, BICYCLE, CANCEL_YN, CHECKIN_TIME, CHECKOUT_TIME, PEOPLE, ROOM_NO, RE_MEM_NO, PAYMENT, PAYMENT_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_ROOM.CURRVAL, SEQ_MNO.CURRVAL, ?, ? )
